website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, durable, heavy-duty tool that effortlessly cuts through just about anything. Suitable for professional use, it's the best in performance and quality.
pros: Tool-free, 4-position blade clamp allows a variety of positions, including flush cutting
Adjustable, pivoting shoe provides depth control and extended blade life
cons: Battery and charger need to be purchased separately
A bit pricey, but well worth the cost

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger batteries too!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as the batteries used are the same as in my DEWALT drill and impact driver. This seems to suck the juice out of the batteries much faster than the drill or driver. I will be ordering the larger size batteries. Use the right blade and it cuts great. You might want a variety pack of blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Rapid City

customer_reviews.title: same quality as a high-end plug in tool.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a plug-in milwaukee plug-in sawzall for years, everyone knows how nice they are. Fifteen or so years ago I got a dewalt 36-volt kit that had a reciprocating saw in it. I've used the snot out of it ever since, especially for pruning and keeping the trails in my woods clear. It was a pretty good saw, not quite as heavy duty as the old milwaukee. This new one is very heavy duty, I've already done quite a bit of work with it, you won't be disappointed. It is kind of aggressively vibraty, but not a problem (or a word)...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy, better than a chain saw.
customer_reviews.text: If your not going to be cutting down any monster trees this is for you. You don't have to worry about the chain coming off or adjusting the tension on the chain or running low on bar chain oil. Great tool. I bought several devices using the same battery. All the blades of other brands are interchangeable and much cheaper than the Dewalt brand which is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Dewalt quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge DeWalt fan,I Have well over 20 different Dewalt 20v cordless options, this Saw overheats after about 10 minutes of use. It doesn’t seem to have the same power as the other Dewalt tools and I must say that my Ryobi reciprocating saw outperforms this Dewalt reciprocating saw. Maybe I got a faulty/lemon one but I am hugely disappointed in the quality of this product. I can’t believe DeWalt put their name on this, it’s more like the harbor freight $20 throw away Reciprocating saw.
customer_reviews.author: JDP55

customer_reviews.title: Saws stuff great like a saw should saw
customer_reviews.text: Works great, adjustable guard is easy to use. I used it the first day for about 30 minutes to test it out with a pruning blade to break up large fallen tree limbs. Still had 2/3 battery and when I started the battery was not fully charged. I will really test this thing over the winter and spring for firewood. I would highly recommend for DIYers and home improvement projects. Price was great too compared to big name in-store prices.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-fi Junky

customer_reviews.title: Hard outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Had one for three year and was used for hard outdoor pruning use. I used this instead of a chainsaw because of all the low cut underbrush would have destroyed my chain. Like any tool certain things start to break down after 3 to 4 hours of daily use. One was the battery connection when using the bigger battery's, but still had a good connection with the smaller battery. The other was the cleat in the front of the saw snapped. Other then that this was a great tool and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Adams

customer_reviews.title: Battery last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Best power tool I have ever bought. I'm gutting a bathroom and have been using the saw for a week and still haven't had to change the battery. I've been using it mostly on wood and sheetrock, haven't tried metal yet. I did cut through tile on the wall and the sheetrock below it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Great light tool for small garden maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cut vines in my trees and small branches and saplings. You need the more powerful 20v battery 5 amp I think. I get about 15 minutes of nice cutting time using a sharp demolition blade. Light and I can use one arm to reach touch to get to vines. Only downside is vibration the lightweight does cause some vibration but it’s an ok trade off. Wear gloves or you might get a blister in the palm. Overall great little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mike's Review

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, powerful, versatile, high-quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, powerful, versatile tool. Excellent quality, typical of DeWalt. Easy to install saw blades in any of four orientations. It's not very light, but that's because it's designed as a workhorse, not an occasional shop tool. Very convenient to have several DeWalt devices that share the 20V battery.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool, just make sure it is the DCS380 not DCS381
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to a full line of Dewalt 20v max in drill driver and ordered DCS380B sawzall. Had Line of Bosch 18 lithium but their battery life is pathetic to say the least. Dumped all my Bosch to change to the Dewalt. Don't get the DCS 381 tool, homeowner version and won't compare. Very happy with this Sawzall, blade release is a bit flimsy so use case, especially if you get a lot of DW or plaster dust into the blade receiver. Blow out and/or lubes with silicone or teflon spray. Latch can be broken easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Knapp

customer_reviews.title: It is also very cool the 90 degree opposed 2nd blade mount
customer_reviews.text: This saw finished my move from 18V to the LiOn tools. It is also very cool the 90 degree opposed 2nd blade mount, no excuse to not being able to cut something ever again... This saw is a monster with the 5 AH battery and a wimp with the sub 3 AH batteries, it's all about the batteries now! Paid $86 for it with free shipping, a most awesome deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it, for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful and easy to use! It pretty much requires 2-handed operation...which is really disappointing, but I knew going in this was NOT the 'compact' model. The compact versions are much more expensive, but it would be pretty neat to use one hand more of the time. Anyway, this thing makes it easy & safe to change blades...the guard works well, and it has an obvious safety button. For this price, I couldn't ask for anything more! Just the tool I needed
customer_reviews.author: John A. Mickus

customer_reviews.title: Good but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: All my tools are DeWalt. Amazing how long this 20V lithium last. Electric power is the future. The only issue I have with this tool is the lever for the blade replacement is way too easy to move and sometimes it moves out during operation. I put a wide rubber band over it to keep it in place and it solved the problem but frankly I should not have to do that. Hope you see my post, DeWalt engineers.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very versital
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, I have used it many times in the garage. It is easy to change blades and you can take a regular hack saw blade and snap it in half and it locks in on the hole in the one end and you have a quick metal cut off blade. It also works with most regular blades. The best thing I like is that it is easy and quick to use. Grab it, pop a battery in and pick the blade you need (which pops in with no wrenches) and you are off cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Up North and Loving It

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely thrilled this item was offered for so little money! I’m am concerned though that 20 volt battery operated tools may become obsolete. I’ve seen many items discontinued when they are offered at such a great deal. I’ve two batteries with charger that I use for my Dewalt drill so adding this tool to my collection is great! Once again Amazon and Dewalt came through. This saw works great around the house! Buy two if you can!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Performs real well for a cordless saw
customer_reviews.text: I used this item for the first time today and it did not disappoint. The 20V battery was powerful enough to drive quickly through hardwood 2x4s several times, cut some tree limbs and large roots, and two small trees before it gave out. Recharge is fast. I especially like that it allows installation of the blade in multiple positions, and that is has a safety switch. Researched many, glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: GOCM

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Light weight compared to standard electric ones
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Light weight compared to standard electric ones. Battery interchangeable with other 20 volt Dewalt tools. Great grip feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Clark

customer_reviews.title: This tool works GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: This tool works GREAT... I love not having a cord twisting around my neck while I am trimming palm trees. Great Product, lots of power, charge lasts a long time. Make sure you buy a battery and charger with this product as this purchase was for the tool only.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Kings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but needs basic improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I just heard from an electrician today that has the compact XR version that he wish he would have gotten the longer one like this so he could get more torque and down pressure when cutting. He said the compact one is not balanced correctly. I wish this version was a brushless type. This does have a variable speed trigger. One downfall is it does not have any LED lights. I’d like to see lights like the jigsaw has, and also one overview light from where the battery mounts.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: My old 18 V that came with my DeWalt kit bit the dust - saw separated at handle and body after years of use. This is a good replacement. Upgraded to 20 V. Can still use my old 18 V batteries with an adapter. Only drawback is that it would not fit in the old kit case so bought a new case for only it. Good DeWalt quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gaspasser

customer_reviews.title: Good, but eats batteries fast
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this much, but seems well built. However, in doing two heavier jobs (some thicker steel and some wet wood), I used up the batteries very quickly; I'll plan on using my old corded saw for any heavy work and keep the cordless for light work where I can't get to a plugin.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for demo
customer_reviews.text: The saw works great for project demo. The blade can be adjusted to either side or upside down to assist in finding the best angle to cut the work piece. Battery power makes it very convenient. You should know that this saw uses up the battery quicker than most other Dewalt tools. The saw does not come with a carry case, but I am ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: KY Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: This saw is just like new and works perfectly. I was about to buy one at a local store, decided to check Amazon and I'm glad I did. I also have a non-DeWalt saw but this is more powerful, comfortable to hold, lighter, and has more features than my old one. Great saw at an excellent price
customer_reviews.author: R. Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Getting My Home Projects Done Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought the Dewalt 20V Max Reciprocating Saw. This little tool has helped me get several home projects done in a short amount of time. I cut down 2 medium bushes with a Diablo pruning blade. I trimmed the bottom of my aluminum gate so that it would open better with a Diablo general blade that cuts through metal. I also use the general blade to cut large items so that they would fit in my trash bin. This tool has made it very easy for me to beautify and declutter my home.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnaJ

customer_reviews.title: Get your projections done ✅
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product don’t get me wrong. It’s a dewalt for crying out loud. I thought it lacked a little in the power department but it worked. I was able to adjust the blade to get into tight spaces. It accepted my batteries from my other dewalt cordless devices. Overall it works great, it’s very functional, and it should have a space in your tool Arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice saw
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt quality is very good and this saw is no exception. I particularly like the ease to quickly change/mount blades without a wrench, and the ability to mount the blade in 4 different positions. I don't how long the battery lasts, I haven't used it for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Doug J

customer_reviews.title: Great and Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than my corded Reciprocating saw, easy to handle and cuts very well. I have used it about 30 times so far with no problems. I like the way you can change the blade from vertical to horizontal, to make it easier to use in any situation. Great product..
customer_reviews.author: B. Markwardt

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want --
customer_reviews.text: This little saw is the best. Lightweight, but sturdy and strong. Bought it for my husband to work around the yard, so he wouldn't have to run long power cords out there for his Milwaukee. He loves it - tells me it is fast and powerful. 20 volt batteries last a long time, too - he was really surprised (and happy) about that. Overall, he finds it easier to work with than his big Milwaukee, and thinks he will get more use of it, too. Great value; very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: banshee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Had to return my original purchase from Amazon due to a defective shoe. But I bought another one at a big box store where I could check it out before I purchased it. I need it for trimming trees and cutting up fallen branches in my yard. It does a great job on limbs as thick as 6 inches. I'm 60 year old 110 lb female and it's light weight enough that I can use it with one hand (better with 2 hands though). Vibrates pretty bad, so hold on tight. Vibration is less under heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Debra James

customer_reviews.title: Great work
customer_reviews.text: To be completley honest, I gave this as a gift to my best friend. We both tried it out on different types of materials, but luckiluy for me i purchased the different variations of blades for it. We tried to cut through, wood, metal, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bashier Abdin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home use. I have actually pressed this saw into professional service and have not destroyed it yet. It must have some self protection circuit or something in it cause when I abuse it, it will briefly stop working. Blade holder seems good. Price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good power and good on batteries
customer_reviews.text: Good power and good on batteries. Had a lot of vibration, but in the end, if you are already invested in Dewalt batteries then this is the sawzall you'll buy... Love the 4-way chuck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am late 60's and have never used anything like this but happy I bought this tool. I have not been able to hire anyone to cut limbs and brush in my yard or back 42 acres with trails so finally gave in and decided to try to do the work myself. I would prefer not to do the work but having this saw has been a life saver. I am able to do a little at a time and get most of the work done.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Andreaemiller

customer_reviews.title: Cord free- but a battery drainer
customer_reviews.text: Great to use without having an attached cord. This will drain your regular size rechargeable battery super fast, so I hope you have the extra large ones. Frustrating that the job isn’t done without switching out the battery with fully charged ones during each project use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Angeline Carson

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Super Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of trees and brush to chip. Some of the branches were too small for my chain saw and the chain saw required two hands. With the reciprocating saw, I was able hold part of the tree and cut 3", 4" and larger branches off the tree in preparation for the chipper. Best tool purchase of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan J. Britton

customer_reviews.title: They shouldn't sell these battery operated
customer_reviews.text: I went back and bought the corded version of this product. I had two of these 20V batteries already so I thought this would be a good addition to my tool set. Unfortunately, it's not powerful enough at all even for the basic jobs I needed it for. Return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. James

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt brand is a high standard of quality tools. I use this around the house. This reciprocating saw is durable and easy to use. Has a built in fence to limit cutting depth and can easily be removed. I also bought blades pack that has several different types.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Use good blades and let it eat.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers use the larger battery. I have the big 5 amp hour battery's and wow it has a lot of chooch factor. It is not the brush-less model but still has plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tata

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for and more
customer_reviews.text: I already had the batteries so this was a no brainer when my 25 yr old Sawzall finally gave out. I hate paying the premium for DeWalt tools, but it's always worth it. Damn it!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Lori Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sawzall without a tail.
customer_reviews.text: Quality tool from Dewalt. I am giving up on corded tools now that I am retired. Love the Dewalt 20V tools. Can't wait to try the 4 position blade connection. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, good price although arrived open box on front porch. Took pictures in case it was damaged it was not it worried me the end was untapped and opened though.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: A much needed tool
customer_reviews.text: Use it for everything. Recommended household necessity. Keep extra batteries on charge. Cutting, trimming tree limbs....excellent choice. Any type of wood work. Metal blades...again, surprising what you can do. Every handi-man needs one. Carry mine with fully charged batteries in my truck everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt is the Best
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt tools are the best, and this one is no exception. It's easy to use, designed well, and powerful. I just need to get some higher "Ah" batteries as this will eat through my tiny 1.5 ah ones.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Portable power and useful
customer_reviews.text: Been using to cut down an old barn roof. Good battery life, plenty of power for old timber, layers of shingles, and huge old nails.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: I always hate getting out extension cords - when I redid my deck this summer, I broke down and bought a cordless reciprocating saw. I will never go back to corded again.
customer_reviews.author: tater salad

customer_reviews.title: Great saw!
customer_reviews.text: Definite upgrade to my corded saws. Great power, convenient, and surprising battery life. Larger/upgraded batteries a must for this saw.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty crude and chintzy tool by DeWalt standards and it burns through batteries, but it certainly does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Spier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite tool - from disassmebling an old pump house to cutting limbs and bolts - this tool has a load of different tasks it can handle.
customer_reviews.author: James Hatz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sawzall! We use it for everything. I landscape in Florida and we always need this tool near by. It's great for roots, branches, cutting fabric and even in fixing irrigation when need be. Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Solid tool. Lots of power and durability. Returned another saw to get this one. I use this a lot at work. Cant go wrong with DeWalt.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my neighbor's to trim a few limbs and immediately went on Amazon and ordered me one. I used the 2 amp batteries from my drill. It lasted about 20-30 minutes, so I may consider buying a higher amp battery for it later. But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with the rest of the DeWalt 20v family
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with other DeWalt 20v tools. Blade holder is easy to operate. Not a light saw but extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: phenryiv1

customer_reviews.title: I now have a number of Dewalt cordless tools and I am very satisfied with all of them
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many different brands of cordless tools over the years and usually found them lacking in either power or durability. I now have a number of Dewalt cordless tools and I am very satisfied with all of them. They are certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Rider

customer_reviews.title: Full size,  full power
customer_reviews.text: Cuts like a beast. BUT you need a 5 or 6 amp battery or flex if you have alot of cutting. It's common sense really.
customer_reviews.author: prbylaura

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tool
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the quality as soon as it was in my hands. Typical of DeWalts top of the line product. Simple to use and effective. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Angie Eberle

customer_reviews.title: Best saws all I ever used
customer_reviews.text: I put wood blade in it to cut some limbs in my back yard, used it all day. And battery still had two lights left. Fantastic saws all . It was shipped very fast. A lot of power, just as much as my corded dewalt saws all. I highly recommend this saw, for the money you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fits with the Dewalt platform.
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this. I've cut metal, wood, 2 trees...anything really, it will cut it. As usual, Dewalt makes good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It took a dip in the Crystal River Bay (salt water) during some dock repair...
customer_reviews.text: fished it out, rinsed thoroughly in fresh water (inside and out) blew it dry with the compressor, let it thoroughly dry in the sun and it works like new... The 5AH battery acted up a bit but is stable now.
customer_reviews.author: cd

customer_reviews.title: No led light
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt is a good saw but there’s no led light like advertised to bad they haven’t redesigned it since 2012 ! It reely needs a light to compete whith there compeditors . please redisine!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about this tool is the ability to change blade positions. Makes getting into tight spots easier. Battery life however is short I bought new 3Ah batteries and it just eats them up. If your doing a lot of cutting be sure you have batteries on charge ready to go, or you'll be waiting. Good tool for the DIY person.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Comes without a battery, I already had that. This saw works great and was a lot less than anywhere else, including the local Lowes or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fits right in with the rest of my DeWalt tools
customer_reviews.text: I got this just for home projects to go with my other DeWalt 20 volt tools and I'm very pleased with its capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Great saw- easy to handle. So far all the Dewalt XR2 battery powered tools have been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Sasser

customer_reviews.title: Quick Blade release!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you DeWalt. No more fiddling with an Allen wrench to get the Blade attached. This Saw is well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Snowblind

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My dad has been using the heck out of this so I can safely say it works fine and I’d buy one for myself one day !!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Lanclos

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed to clean up a 100’ oak tree that fell in my backyard. This easily cut through the small to medium branches. I was able to get about 29-30 minutes with the 20V Max battery. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F

customer_reviews.title: Got bamboozled
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a refurbished saw. Sold as new. The black blade protector rattles like crazy. The protector is loose and looks like it was added by someone and not at factory. Noise it makes from rattle while in use drives me crazy. As if cutting metal studs isn't loud enough. Next time I will spend the extra $30 and buy it from Home Depot or Lowes
customer_reviews.author: Doug Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my truck. Comes in handy. Works just like the rest of my DeWalt tools
customer_reviews.author: Anna Flemon

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt tools
customer_reviews.text: I own several 20v dewalt tools and i love them but this just dosent have the same feel of quality . The battery is a very poor fit and it took some force to get it to slide into position . It will probably work fine but maybe I should have spent a little more and bought the more expensive one .
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the 20 V batteries.
customer_reviews.text: As far as cordless tools go I would highly recommend any Dewalt product.
customer_reviews.author: Nor notrub

customer_reviews.title: Really cuts the mustard - and the trailer that delivered it if you wanted to!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the two batteries that came with my DeWalt 20 volt drill. I ordered the DeWalt box of assorted blades for it at the same time. Nice selection in a great case. The way you can easily insert the blades with the cutting edge at 12:00 o'clock, 3:00, 6:00 and 9:00 is great. No need to be a double-jointed contortionist to cut at virtually any angle. Forget an electric chainsaw for most home tree/shrub trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Moreno

customer_reviews.title: In a yellow Dewalt box on the doorstep.
customer_reviews.text: My only birch is it was a dewalt box on the doorstep. Easily identified has a DeWalt tool
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Tough like Dewalt product should be but kills a new battery super fast. Not cool. I need it to work longer
customer_reviews.author: Muggsie

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: No battery with order. An excellent saw with battery drive. Great price at the time, works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: VVet69

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cut roots from a small tree that had died. Plenty of power to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: O Banger

customer_reviews.title: BEST of the BEST
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a DEWALT. The tool works great and they last.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Over a year's worth of working and still runs strong. Never had a problem with it and probably will never need another one. Great buy if you use these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jigmaster

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful and the vibration is very bad compared to my older and cheaper Ryobi saw. Overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Commander

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought nto replace my borrowed but never returned corded sawzall. I will only use occasionally. I used it to remove my old deck steps. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: James Jones

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a present for my husband and he loves it. His expectations are fully met. Said it’s very powerful considering that it’s on a battery. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Yana B

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Built well and the optional blade setting allows for many uses. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: On one charge, it lasted a full day of heavy use. Been using this now for a few weeks every day and it has proven a sturdy tool
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt won't let you down.
customer_reviews.text: I own many Dewalt battery tools and they all work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Saw
customer_reviews.text: Really good saw!! It’s a Dewalt no need to say more
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Trigger mechanism broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really good a few times. After about the third time using it, the trigger mechanism broke and it won't turn on. Dewalt is going to fix it, not sure how long it will take.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Uhland

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 minute
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this product for a few months and when I did it literally froze within one minute of use!!!! Scary!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got to using the tool immediately to cut branches for fire wood. Cuts like butter. I ordered the 9 inch bosch blades for larger branches. Pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt items are well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My son requesting this item for Christmas. He uses all sorts of tools daily for his job and was very exited to have received what he asked for. He loves the Dewalt brand items, they work well and are well built.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes lacks a little torque, but for a cordless ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes lacks a little torque, but for a cordless tool its indispensable for getting around without having to trail a cord everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E. Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good product
customer_reviews.text: Best value for such a durable product. Fast shipping. Great price unmatched elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita

customer_reviews.title: shipping was faster than expected which was great..
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i thought i was ordering... shipping was faster than expected which was great... my husband wishes i purchased the extra long running battery though cause the standard battery doesnt get him through the workday without swapping for a freshly charged one but for the average user im sure the standard one would do just for for a few hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: DesignsByNicolette

customer_reviews.title: Cover the Dewalt letters
customer_reviews.text: How stupid big yellow and black letters.. DEWALT.. SO LUCKY I recieved this package.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this saw.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in September, dead in December. Light duty at best. Unless you are a homeowner who uses this tool once in a while, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Clementz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The saw works great... minus 1 star just because the grip will give you a bluster in a very short time. Even with gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool I use it for a lot of things
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: One of the better reciprocating saws I've used
customer_reviews.text: One of the better reciprocating saws I've used. Used to use corded power saws and was a hassle finding places to plug them in. This battery powered saw is a tremendous improvement. It is powerful, lighter and more versatile than the older nickel cadmium battery ones and lasts much longer per charge. No need to bring the charger because this saw will last all day on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best recip out there
customer_reviews.text: I have have owned for almost a year and used the standand recip blades along with Lee Vally's punning blade where I cleared under brush and limbs up the 6' with no slow down.
customer_reviews.author: John Mann

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and love that you can put the blades in 4 different ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and love that you can put the blades in 4 different directions! Used it to cut old toilet flange bolts and cut like butter! Love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this long ago. I have an electric sawzall but this is so useful and I love the way you can saw down, up, left, or right, and changing the blades is a snap, even for an old man like me. If you don't have one, get one.
customer_reviews.author: N R Rogers

customer_reviews.title: A lot faster less work
customer_reviews.text: Love it I do a lot of trimming , a lot faster then clippers
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J.

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V MAX Reciprocating Saw, Tool Only (DCS380B)
product_meta.description: Style:Saw OnlyThe DEWALT DCS380B 20V MAX Li-Ion Reciprocating Saw features a 4-Position Blade Clamp that allows for flush cutting and increased positional versatility with tool free blade changes. The 1-1/8" stroke length delivers a faster cutting speed, and the variable speed trigger with 0-3000 spm (strokes per minute) provides increased blade control and faster cut speed. This saw has a pivoting adjustable shoe which extends blade life and allows depth of cut control, along with a rubber over molded comfort grip that delivers optimal comfort and control. It also features a double oil sealed shaft resists contamination and increases durability. This is a bare tool item, battery sold separately.
feature_bullets: The 4-position blade clamp allows for flush cutting and increased positional versatility
Has 1-1/8-Inch stroke length delivers a faster cutting speed
Variable speed trigger with 0-3000 spm provides increased blade control and faster cut speed
Pivoting adjustable shoe extends blade life and allows depth of cut control
Does not come with a blade

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,481 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
